Author: just-a-mess
Text: relapses are terrifying. just leaving treatment myself, i'n scared for the reappearance of my triggers. if you're looking to stay in recovery, reaching out to people asap is probably the best thing to prevent falling back bc lapses and relapses *are* a part of making progress. we all slide backwards. but i get why you wouldn't want to, sometimes it feels like all or nothing.
